content: Bitcoin Holder (BTCHODL)Initial supply: 21,000,000,000,000Contract: 0x6ab8D6B8fd0Ea43be5B04fd257484399Cf672103Bitcoin Holder (BTCHODL) is a BEP20 deflationary token supply designed to store value in the cryptocurrency market by burning tokens with every purchase and sale.Bitcoin Holder is a decentralized financial payments network that rebuilds the traditional payments stack on the Binance Smart Chain blockchain.BTCHODL designed to be the simplest Token possible, with token buy and sell fees, Buy Tax: 5%, Sell Tax: 3%, Burn 3.7%, a decentralized version of conventional financial opportunities.Tokenomics: https://btcbr.info/coin/bitcoinholder/Discord: https://discord.gg/yW6zz6j8BHBuy on Website: https://btcbr.info/btchodl.phpCoinBrain: https://coinbrain.com/coins/0x6ab8D6B8fd0Ea43be5B04fd257484399Cf672103Arken: https://swap.arken.finance/tokens/bsc/0x6ab8D6B8fd0Ea43be5B04fd257484399Cf672103DexGuru: https://dex.guru/token/0x6ab8D6B8fd0Ea43be5B04fd257484399Cf672103-bscCharts: https://charts.bogged.finance/?c=bsc&t=0x6ab8D6B8fd0Ea43be5B04fd257484399Cf672103Poocoin: https://poocoin.app/tokens/0x6ab8D6B8fd0Ea43be5B04fd257484399Cf672103Dexscreener: https://dexscreener.com/bsc/0x8f11a087078ce21f86ef77b24fb28cd5a5e22f97PancakeSwap: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x6ab8D6B8fd0Ea43be5B04fd257484399Cf672103Add Liquidify: https://pancakeswap.finance/add/BNB/0x6ab8D6B8fd0Ea43be5B04fd257484399Cf672103Explorer: https://bscscan.com/token/0x6ab8D6B8fd0Ea43be5B04fd257484399Cf672103Please, vote for $BTCHODL https://cryptovotelist.com/coin/bitcoin-holderHelp us get trending on CVL!Coinhunters: https://coinhunters.cc/tokens/BitcoinHolderMore Info: https://btcbr.info/bitcoinholder/
